description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Rejuvenating Flames]

You create a gout of flame that both heals and burns. You restore 1d4 HP to all allies in the area, and those allies gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saves for 1 minute. Enemies in the area take @Damage[1d4[fire]] damage with a basic Reflex save. Heightened (+1) You restore an additional 1d4 HP to your allies and deal an additional @Damage[1d4[fire]] damage to enemies.
